remarks: EquMoveTerm generator rule.  (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 7-Apr-2020.)
statement:
int-eqmvtd.1 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
int-eqmvtd.2 $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
int-eqmvtd.3 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
int-eqmvtd.4 $e |- ( ph -> A = ( C + D ) ) $.
int-eqmvtd $p |- ( ph -> C = ( B - D ) ) $.
